caption.p: A) Recombination pattern (according to jpHMM) of the URF_0622 (accession number MF109682) discovered in the ICONIC dataset and the sequences AF064699 and EU743963, prototypes of the recombinants CRF06_cpx and CRF22_01A1, respectively. B) Bootscanning analysis of the URF_0106G performed using SimPlot and diagram showing the definitive recombination pattern.
